content:
Hey all, I'm new here and this is my first time using Zulip so apologies if I'm doing it wrong, but seems like there should be an introductions topic? Otherwise it feels a bit strange to me to just Kool-Aid-Man into y'all's conversations out of nowhere.

Anyway, I'm Alex Guyot, lead software engineers over at MacStories for anyone who's into Apple-y stuff, and also an engineer at a small startup in the Twin Cities area in Minnesota. Been a Changelog listener for a couple years now and I'm excited to finally jump on the ++ train and to hang out with you all on Zulip!

Hopefully others drop more intros in here!
I think most people have used this topic? #general > introduce yourself!
